vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development Subdistrict for CA-1 Central Area Subdistrict uses on property zoned an MF-3 Multiple Family Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 193, the Oak Lawn Special Purpose District, on the southeast side of Nowitzki Way, between North Houston Street and North Field Street
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a conceptual plan, street sections, height zone exhibits, and conditions
Z201-140(ND)

Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a conceptual plan, street sections, height zone exhibits, and conditions
Z201-140(ND)
